articles.author: R. Prasad
articles.title: Coronavirus | I would not take the vaccine without efficacy data: Gagandeep Kang - The Hindu
articles.description: Even without missteps we have misinformation, warns the virologist, and any doubts can be blown up into larger conspiracy theories
articles.content: A year after the outbreak of the novel coronavirus, which has claimed 1.8 million lives so far, scientists, manufacturers and drug regulators the world over have been speeding up the timelines for th… [+5742 chars]
